name: Fathom Digital Manufacturing Corporation
description: Fathom Digital Manufacturing Corporation is a leading provider of advanced manufacturing services, specializing in rapid prototyping and low-volume production. Established in 2016, Fathom leverages cutting-edge technologies such as additive manufacturing, CNC machining, and injection molding to deliver high-quality components and solutions to a diverse range of industries including aerospace, automotive, medical, and consumer products. The company prides itself on its ability to accelerate product development cycles for its clients, helping them bring their innovations to market faster and more efficiently. Fathom’s extensive capabilities are supported by its team of skilled engineers and technicians who work closely with customers to understand their unique needs and create tailored solutions. With a commitment to quality and precision, Fathom has positioned itself as a trusted partner for companies looking to enhance their manufacturing processes and reduce costs. The company is dedicated to sustainability and actively seeks to minimize waste and energy consumption throughout its operations, contributing to a greener future in manufacturing.

seo.meta_title: Fathom Digital Manufacturing Corporation | Advanced Manufacturing Solutions
seo.meta_description: Explore Fathom Digital Manufacturing Corporation, a leader in advanced manufacturing services including 3D printing, CNC machining, and injection molding. Learn about our innovative solutions.

faq.question: What services does Fathom offer?
faq.answer: Fathom offers services in additive manufacturing, CNC machining, and injection molding, focusing on rapid prototyping and low-volume production.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Fathom?
faq.answer: Ryan Martin is the CEO of Fathom Digital Manufacturing Corporation.

faq.question: Where is Fathom headquartered?
faq.answer: Fathom is headquartered in Milwaukee, Wisconsin, USA.
